name: Fort Kit (20-pc.)
description:
ONLY 12 LEFT!

Receive your Stick-lets in time for Christmas.
Domestic (USA): Order by Dec 16th
Europe, Canada, Australia: Order by Dec. 7th

The Fort Kit will introduce creative minds to the endless possibilities of constructing with sticks. These flexible connectors provide enough modularity and options to get inventors started. Our goal?: To encourage children to go back outside and play! Let the stick scavenging and fort construction begin! 

*FORT KIT 2.0* includes: (3) Monarch Orange, (3) Starfish Red, (4) Pardon My Purple, (3) Huckleberry Blue, (4) Grasshopper Green, (3) Birch Bark White and a 6" x 8" natural muslin bag which also acts as your fort flag. 

___________________

Ages 6+
Connectors: 100% Silicone, ROHS Compliant, Recyclable, Made in Taiwan
Packaging: 100% Recyclable Packaging, Made in the USA

Disclaimer: Not intended to be put in the mouth or chewed on. Not intended to support weight or suspend from. For example: Stick-lets are not intended for building a tree swing.

Care Instructions: Rinse with water and soap as needed. 

Designed and Assembled in the United States by Kazakia Design LLC
Made in Taiwan  |  Stick-lets™ is patent protected
